snippet: New albums include Grace Potter and the Nocturnals’ “Lion the Beast the Beat,” Josh Turner’s “Punching Bag” and “Year of the Snake,” from the jazz trio Fly.
abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews The Lion the Beast the Beat, latest album from rock band Grace Potter and the Nocturnals; Ben Ratliff reviews Punching Bag, new CD from country singer Josh Turner; Nate Chinen reviews album Year of the Snake by jazz group Fly.

byline.original: By JON CARAMANICA, NATE CHINEN and BEN RATLIFF

lead_paragraph: New albums include Grace Potter and the Nocturnals’ “Lion the Beast the Beat,” Josh Turner’s “Punching Bag” and “Year of the Snake,” from the jazz trio Fly.

headline.seo: New Albums From Grace Potter, Josh Turner and Fly
headline.main: New Albums From Grace Potter, Josh Turner and Fly
